{{Wireless embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR5455 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=05/23/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=USI |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=IXM-APGBR03,IXM-RTGBR03 |ic_id=550A-15043 |pwr_v=9 |pwr_amp=1.2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM5354 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320CBTC-70G |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4S281632I-UC75 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM5354 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware=DD-WRT |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=USR5455 |default_ssid_regex=^USR5455$ |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=00:14:C1 |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|802.11g Wireless MAXg Access Point}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=5455}}
The default SSID appears to be '''USR5455''' (it is the entry in the manual), :though there are not many entries (only ~80) in WiGLE's database.
===Forum threads=== *[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=60841 DD-WRT builds for the USR5465 / USR5455 on the '''DD-WRT''' forums]
